nodes.text: Mintea was a beverage served in glasses that was consumable by humans. The drink was a favorite of the Alderaanian Princess Leia Organa. In 3 BBY, Queen Breha Organa, her adoptive mother, carried a frosty glass of mintea into the library of the Royal Palace of Alderaan on the Core Worlds planet Alderaan while meeting with her daughter there.
Mintea first appeared in Leia, Princess of Alderaan, a 2017 young-adult novel written by Claudia Gray.
